attributes.action: Strip Baroness Jones of all titles and privileges.
attributes.additional_details: Using a tragic murder to stir up sexist, anti-male sentiment is behaviour unbecoming of anyone holding a title and position of responsibility. The comments made bring shame not only to the House of Lords and the government but every forward thinking, law abiding citizen in n the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
attributes.background: Respond to the outrageous, sexist and discriminatory remarks made by the Baroness Jones in the House of Lords.

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions that call for people to lose their job, or be removed from a role.
